name: The Mirror's Curse
description:
In this game, you play as a girl who enters a twisted carnival world by falling through a funhouse mirror. To escape, you must solve puzzles, help out the denizens of this world remember their past, and challenge the ruler of this world. 

This game was the first game that we made in unity and was made in the fall of 2017. This was a 2D side-scroller puzzle game.
